title: Devasena Diamond Kada - Divine Embrace of Tradition
materials: meticulously crafted with Hyderabadi Polish to enhance its antique luster. The gold weight is approximately 45 grams.
features: This exquisite Kada showcases intricate filigree work (jali work) adorned with sparkling diamonds. The centerpiece features a beautifully detailed miniature temple motif, meticulously handcrafted using the Nakshi technique, bringing a touch of divine grace. The floral and vine patterns symbolize prosperity and growth, common in South Indian jewelry design. The setting ensures maximum brilliance for each diamond.
colors: Rich golden hue complemented by the dazzling white sparkle of the brilliant cut diamonds. The antique Hyderabadi polish gives it a warm
occasions: Perfect for traditional South Indian ceremonies like weddings (Vivaha Bandhanam)
Ugadi). Also suitable for upscale cultural events and family gatherings where a touch of tradition is desired. A timeless gift for anniversaries and milestone birthdays.
description: This Kada is a harmonious blend of traditional craftsmanship and modern elegance.
